=====================================

Land Surveying Services - Standing Offer
----------------------------------------

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number:** MX-42979628638
*   **Amendment Number:** 3
*   **Solicitation Number:** GW23ST01
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-12-15
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-30T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2024-01-30
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not Applicable
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** Not Applicable
*   **Tender Status:** Expired
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV

#### Tender Overview

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is soliciting abbreviated proposals from consulting firms to establish a Standing Offer (SO) for land surveying services specific to Department of National Defence (DND) requirements for 14 Wing Greenwood and its satellite locations, Nova Scotia.

The SO will be for a period of three (3) years with a maximum estimated value of $500,000.00. Commissions under the SO are expected to be valued between $5,000.00 and $30,000.00; the maximum value of a commission under the SO is $60,000.00.

#### Required Services

The following services are required:

*   Project Manager
*   Licensed Nova Scotia Land Surveyor
*   I Person Crew GPS Surveyor
*   2 Person Crew GPS Surveyor
*   2 Person Crew Total Station Surveying
*   Party Chief
*   Survey Technician
*   CADD Technician
*   GIS Technician
*   Total Classification Rate

#### Bidding and Documents

Bidding and documents are available on [http://www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; please see [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.
